thread.title: [ Law & Ethics ] Open Question : Can you get extra food stamp money if you have food allergies or dietary restrictions?
thread.title_full: [ Law & Ethics ] Open Question : Can you get extra food stamp money if you have food allergies or dietary restrictions?

title: [ Law & Ethics ] Open Question : Can you get extra food stamp money if you have food allergies or dietary restrictions?
text: Next Can you get extra food stamp money if you have food allergies or dietary restrictions? What if someone has Celiac's Disease (can't eat gluten), is lactose intolerant, or has diabetes or another health issue... Are they eligible to receive extra food stamp money (as opposed to a healthy person who can eat whatever they want)? I know that a gluten-free diet is expensive, and I cannot see how... show more What if someone has Celiac's Disease (can't eat gluten), is lactose intolerant, or has diabetes or another health issue... Are they eligible to receive extra food stamp money (as opposed to a healthy person who can eat whatever they want)? I know that a gluten-free diet is expensive, and I cannot see how someone on food stamps would be able to afford that without extra help. Also, it it does not make sense to me to put a healthy person on the same food stamp allowance as someone who is unwell. Follow Are you sure you want to delete this answer?
